byline.contributor: Salman Masood reported from Islamabad, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. Mohammed Ali Kalfood contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen; Somini Sengupta from the United Nations; and Michael R. Gordon from Washington.
byline.original: By SALMAN MASOOD and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Saudi Arabia asks Pakistan to join military campaign against Houthi rebels in Yemen; request may indicate plans for ground offensive.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan’s defense minister told Parliament that Saudi Arabia had asked for aircraft, warships and soldiers, possibly signaling Saudi plans to expand its offensive in Yemen.

headline.main: Saudis Ask Pakistan to Join the Fight in Yemen
headline.print_headline: Saudis Ask Pakistan to Join the Fight in Yemen

snippet: Pakistan’s defense minister told Parliament that Saudi Arabia had asked for aircraft, warships and soldiers, possibly signaling Saudi plans to expand its offensive in Yemen.
